en.start:
Hello! I'm *EZ Sticker Bot*. I can help you make stickers! Type /help to get started or /info to get information about me.

üåê To change the bot language use /lang.
en.help:
To add a sticker to a pack with @Stickers, your file must be saved in png format, have at least one dimension of 512px, and be less than 512Kb.

 You can send me any photo or sticker, and I will format it to meet all three requirements and send it back to you as a file ready to be added to your pack!
en.info:
*EZ Sticker Bot* is a bot that I develop and host with no expectation of ever gaining anything from it other than the satisfaction of helping fellow Telegram users.

Sharing this bot in your groups/channels would help people make their own great sticker packs for us all to use!

I've created *{:,}* stickers for people so far!

Send it any photo or sticker and it will convert and resize it for you!

en.select_mode:
Select which bot mode you would like to use.

The mode you set will determine what the bot does when you send it a photo or sticker.
en.file_mode_info:
Bot mode has been set to *Sticker File Creation Mode*.

This is the default mode EzStickerBot operates in. When you send a photo, sticker, image file, or image URL it will be formatted and sent back to you as a file ready to be added to a pack using @Stickers.
en.personal_mode_info:
Bot mode has been set to *Personal Pack Mode*.

This mode let's you create a personal sticker pack that *you can use by typing @EzStickerBot in any chat*.

In this mode, any photos, stickers, image files, or image URLs will be immediately be added to a pack that only you can see and use. These stickers do not have emoji and won't display a pack when clicked on. When you type @EzStickerBot in a chat you will be shown the stickers in your pack sorted with your most used at the beginning. To remove a sticker from your pack you can either click the remove button attached to the sticker preview sent when you added it to your pack or by using /personal command.
en.personal_sticker_added:
Nice! That sticker has been added to your personal pack.

This is how it will look when you send it.

It will take about 15 seconds to show up in your pack. Type @EzStickerBot in any chat to send it.
en.removed_sticker:
Ok, I've removed this sticker from your personal pack.

You should stop seeing it in about 15 seconds.
en.already_removed_sticker:
I couldn't find this sticker in your pack!

Perhaps you already removed it?
en.no_personal_pack:
It looks like you don't have any stickers in your personal pack yet!

Use /mode and select the *{}* button to start adding stickers to your pack.
en.personal_pack_info:
*Personal Pack Info:*

You currently have *{:,}* stickers in your pack which you have used a total of *{:,}* times.
